author: Джордж Р. Р. Мартин
description: The first volume in the "A Song of Ice and Fire" trilogy which tells of the treachery, greed and war threatening the Seven Kingdoms south of the Wall. In a world scarred by battle and catastrophe, it describes the deeds of a people locked in conflict and the legacy they will leave their children.
title: A Song of Ice and Fire. Book 1. A Game of Thrones
